import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    good = True
    i = 0
    while i < n-1:
        if s[i] == s[i+1]:
            good = False
            break
        i += 2
    if good:
        print(0)
        print(s)
    else:
        print(n-i)
        print(s[:i] + s[i+1:])

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

stack = []
for i in range(n):
    stack.append(s[i])
    if len(stack) > 1 and stack[-1] == stack[-2]:
        stack.pop()
        stack.pop()

print(n - len(stack))
print(''.join(stack))

def main():
    n = int(input())  # number of characters in the string
    s = input()  # the string
    good = True
    i = 0
    while i < n - 1:
        if s[i] == s[i + 1]:
            good = False
            break
        i += 2
    if good:
        print(0)
        print(s)
    else:
        print(n - i)
        print(s[:i] + s[i + 1:])


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
    a.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ans += abs(a[i] - (i+1))
    print(ans)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
